titles: The nature of truth, its union and unity with the soule which is one in its essence, faculties, acts, one with truth / discussed by the Right Honorable Robert Lord Brook, in a letter to a private friend ; by whom it is now published for the publick good.
author: Brooke, Robert Greville, Baron, 1607-1643.
publisher: Printed by R. Bishop, for Samuel Cartwright ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
